item.description:
Hi Incubators!!!

Lost Marbles aka the troupe that Ben, Robin, Lisa, Sandy, and I are in got a last minute gig tonight as part of the Sgt. Culpepper Improv Jam Show at Improv Boston tonight starting at 7pm.

Tickets I think are rather cheap, I think $10 and a little less for those hanging onto those student IDs.

They'll be a few different comedy acts and then to top it all off, the stage then gets open to you the audience. We'll all play a few open improv games and you'll be able to get on stage with us and try it out. It'll be just like an incubator! Yay!

Check out www.improvboston.com

Come check us out and laugh off that turkey hangover.

Any questions? Let me know!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.name: Lost Marbles last minute performance TONIGHT!!! at Improv Boston!!!!
